Task: Installation and Setup
Module Installation & solr setup
Action: Install module and dependencies as per documentation.
Expected Response: OralHistoryCmodel is created in the repository and datastreams can be viewed (RELS-EXT, DS-COMPOSITE-MODEL, and DC datastream)

Task: AUDIO CRUD functions (using a user with appropriate permissions that is not user 1)
Ingest audio file with XML transcript
Action: Ingest an audio file that is supported by the audio solution pack alongside an XML transcript
Expected Response: Audio file is present and playable - transcript appears in viewer and is available in CC

Task: Ingest audio file with WebVTT transcript
Action: Ingest an audio file that is supported by the audio solution pack alongside a WebVTT transcript
Expected Response: Audio file is present and playable - transcript appears in viewer and is available in CC

Task: Ingest audio file without transcript
Action: Ingest an audio file without a transcript file
Expected Response: Audio file is generated without additional OH datastreams

Task: View ingested audio file without transcript
Add transcript datastream (XML) to audio file that did not have transcript
Action: Add a transcript datastream
Expected Response: Transcript is added and appropriate datastreams appear

Task: Add transcript datastream (WebVTT) to audio file that did not have transcript
Action: Add a transcript datastream
Expected Response: Transcript is added and appropriate datastreams appear

Task: Replace transcript datastream with a new datastream
Action: Replace transcript datastreams
Expected Response: New transcript datastreams are added and appropriate derivitives are created and playable.

Task: Replace MEDIATRACK datastream with a new datastream
View Transcripts UI Editor

Expected Response: changes are reflected

Action: edit speaker name in audio file
Expected Response: changes are reflected

Expected Response: changes are reflected

Action: Press edit button

Action: Regenerate all datastreams that can be regenerated

Task: Testing the Permissions provided by the module
View repository objects
Action: Toggle a user's permission to view repository objects, and navigate to an Oral History object
Expected Response: User with permission to view repository objects can view OH objects. Users without this permission cannot view OH objects.

Task: Add datastreams to repository objects
Action: Toggle a user's permission to add datastreams to repository objects, and navigate to an Oral History Object, an attempt to add a datastream.
Expected Response: User with permissions to add datastreams to repository objects can do so on OH objects. Users without this permission cannot add datastreams to OH objects.

Task: Edit metadata
Action: Toggle a user's permission to edit metadata and navigate to an Oral History Object. Attempt to edit metadata.
Expected Response: User with permissions to edit metadata can edit metadata on OH objects. Users without this permission cannot add datastreams to OH objects.

Task: Create new repository objects
Action: Toggle a user's permission to create new repository objects and attempt to add an OH object.
Expected Response: User with permissions to create new repository objects can ingest OH objects. Users without this permission cannot.

Task: Permanently remove objects from the repository
Action: Toggle a user's permission to permanently remove objects from the repository and attempt to remove them.
Expected Response: User with permission to permanently remove objects from the repository can do so. User without this permission cannot.

Task: Manage object properties
Action: Toggle a user's permission to manage object properties.
Expected Response: Users with the permission to manage object properties can manage object properties. Users without the permission to manage object properties cannot.

Task: View datastream history
Action: Toggle a user's permission to view datastream history.
Expected Response: Users with the permission to view datastream history can do so. Users without the permission to view datastream history cannot.

Task: Revert datastream history
Action: Toggle a user's permission to revert datastream history.
Expected Response: Users with the permission to revert datastream history can do so. Users without this permission cannot.

Task: Manage deleted objects
Action: Toggle a user's permission to manage deleted objects.
Expected Response: Users with the permission to manage deleted objects can do so. Users without this permission cannot.

Task: Regenerate derivatives
Action: Toggle a user's permission to regenerate derivitives.
Expected Response: Users with the permission to regenerate derivitives can do so. Users without this permission cannot.

Task: Replace datastreams
Action: Toggle a user's permission to replace datastreams.
Expected Response: Users with the permission to replace datastreams can do so. Users without this permission cannot.

Task: Solr Searching
Search for content on an annotation
Action: Search for content that has been added to an annotation.
Expected Response: Annotaiton content is returned in a solr search.

Task: Search speaker on an annotation
Action: Search for a unique speaker value in a transcript
Expected Response: Speaker value is returned in a solr search.

Task: Confirm fields specified in configuration have been indexed
Action: Navigate to Solr and perform a query for values unique to the fields provided in the configuration.
Expected Response: Fields confirmed in configuration have been indexed by solr.

Task: Configuration Testing
Enable: Create WEBVTT file for captions or subtitles on an audio/video file.
Action: Enable "Create WEBVTT file for captions or subtitles on an audio file" in admin/islandora/solution_pack_config/oralhistories and ingest a file
Expected Response: WEBVTT MEDIATRACK is created and can be found under Oral History Object > Manage > Datastreams

Task: Enable: Enable captions/subtitles display on an audio/video file.
Action: Enable "Enable captions/subtitles display on an audio file" in admin/islandora/solution_pack_config/oralhistories
Expected Response: CC Caption button in player appears, along with captioning test if it is enabled

Task: Enable: Enable transcript display on an audio/video file.
Action: Enable "Enable transcript display on an audio file" in admin/islandora/solution_pack_config/oralhistories
Expected Response: Transcript viewer appears below the oral history object, with Transcript tab, playback buttons, timecoded buttons for each cue

Task: Enable: Display media and transcript side-by-side on an audio/video file.
Action: Enable "Display media and transcript side-by-side on an audio file" in admin/islandora/solution_pack_config/oralhistories
Expected Response: If transcript display is enabled: Oral history object and Transcript viewer are placed and scaled to fit horizontally, side by side. If transcript display is disabled: Oral history object is scaled to fit horizontally, transcript display is not viewable.

Task: Enable: Generate datastream for WebVTT indexing on an audio/video file.
Action: Enable "Generate datastream for WebVTT indexing on an audio file" in admin/islandora/solution_pack_config/oralhistories and ingest a file with a webvtt transcript
Expected Response: XML INDEXMEDIATRACK is created and can be found under Oral History Object > Manage > Datastreams

Task: Disable: Create WEBVTT file for captions or subtitles on an audio/video file.
Action: Disable "Create WEBVTT file for captions or subtitles on an audio file" in admin/islandora/solution_pack_config/oralhistories and ingest a file
Expected Response: With this option disabled, the MEDIATRACK datastream is not generated.

Task: Disable: Enable captions/subtitles display on an audio/video file.
Action: Disable "Enable captions/subtitles display on an audio file" in admin/islandora/solution_pack_config/oralhistories
Expected Response: CC caption button in player and captions are not viewable

Task: Disable: Enable transcript display on an audio/video file.
Action: Disable "Enable transcript display on an audio file" in admin/islandora/solution_pack_config/oralhistories
Expected Response: Transcript viewer is not visible when viewing oral history object

Task: Disable: Display media and transcript side-by-side on an audio/video file.
Action: Disable "Display media and transcript side-by-side on an audio file" in admin/islandora/solution_pack_config/oralhistories
Expected Response: If transcript display is enabled: transcript viewer is visible below oral history object. If transcript display is disabled: oral history object is viewable, transcript viewer is not viewable.

Task: Disable: Generate datastream for WebVTT indexing on an audio/video file.
Action: Disable "Generate datastream for WebVTT indexing on an audio file" in admin/islandora/solution_pack_config/oralhistories
Expected Response: INDEXMEDIATRACK datastream is not generated

Task: Specify VTT default language code(s) on an audio/video file.
Action: In admin/islandora/solution_pack_config/oralhistories, Add and remove languages indicated in VTT file

Task: Settings Edit multiple tiers in Transcripts UI
Action: Enter/remove tiers in admin/islandora/solution_pack_config/oralhistories/transcripts

Task: Edge Cases
Create a transcript with multiple tiers
Action: Add additional transcript tiers in XML transcript, add tiers to admin/islandora/solution_pack_config/oralhistories/transcripts configuration

Task: Ingest multiple WebVTT of different languages and test default code
Action: Take WebVTT documents of various languages and add.

Task: Use in compound solution pack
Action: Create an Islandora Compound object, add an oral history to the compound
Expected Response: Oral history object is included in the compound object (viewed through the interface and also compound contains the RELS-EXT isConstituentOf predicate to the oral history object), in Compound navigation block oral history appears

Task: Use escaped characters in Transcripts UI editing interface
Batch ingest audio
Batch ingest video
Batch ingest audio and oral
